pkgmetadata.longdescription: # python-homewizard-kitchenThis package connects to the HomeWizard Kitchen's websocket to get & update a device status.This project currently only implements the Kettle device.Tested on a HomeWizard Kettle 1.4,HWK-KTL 1.07## Installation```pip install homewizard-kitchen```## UsageSee [example.py](https://github.com/lesleyxyz/python-homewizard-kitchen/blob/main/example.py)Afterwards you can use the Kettle model to update & retrieve data.
